title: Metaverse-ready
text:
Develop an event space in Sandbox. Holders will be able to display, shop, and sell Internet Made NFTs there.
Q1 2022

title: Internet Made ecosystem.
text: Holders of the genesis NFT collection with exclusive traits will get airdropped a metaverse NFT that is also a 3D model. <u>Q2 2022</u>

title: Fashion community
text: Fashion Accelerator DAO - Our community will be able to participate and decide which collaborations move forward. They will also vote on which talented designers will receive capital to launch their careers, and which of those designers receive the support of our platform to release their creations. <u>Q3 2022</u>
